content.rendered:
Tuesday, November 19, 2024
Today is a “B” Day

Club Meetings and Information

  • Attention Pop Culture Icon Club – we will be meeting after school in the Large Group Room on Wednesday, November 20. Please let Ms. Schnorr know if you need a late bus pass.
  • There is a student council meeting in Mrs. Kerls room on Wednesday, November 20 after school.
  • Best Buddies will meet after school- 2:20-3:00 on November 20 in the Library. Please see Miss Douglas with any questions.
  • MAGSA’s next meeting will be this Wednesday, November 20th, after school in room E138. See Mr. Kane with any questions.
  • Math Club will be meeting in Room R232 after school on Wednesday, 11/20. All students grade 6-8 are welcome.
  • International Club will be meeting right after school on Wednesday, November 20 in room 255. All are welcome to join us.

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information!

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
